CustomField.formula:
IMAGE ( IF( ISPICKVAL(Matrix_Priority__c,"Low"), "/img/samples/flag_green.gif", IF( ISPICKVAL(Matrix_Priority__c,"Medium"), "/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", IF( ISPICKVAL(Matrix_Priority__c,"High"), "/img/samples/flag_red.gif", " "
) ) ), "", 15, 15 )
CustomField.label: Priority Flag
